quarks.runtime.etiao

Class InvocationContext<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.runtime.etiao.AbstractContext<I,O>
      • quarks.runtime.etiao.InvocationContext<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Data container type for input tuples.
    O - Data container type for output tuples.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuntimeServices, OpletContext<I,O>

    public class InvocationContext<I,O>
extends AbstractContext<I,O>
    Context information for the Oplet's execution context.

        Creates an InvocationContext with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - the oplet's unique identifier
        job - the current job's context
        services - service provider for the current job
        inputCount - number of oplet's inputs
        outputs - list of oplet's outputs
